name: Shooter Pew Pew
description:
This bullet hell space shooter is not for the faint hearted. There are never-ending ship upgrades, and just when you think you're stronger than everyone, a new enemy appears to try and take you down. Try to survive as long as possible!

- Infinitely challenging waves of enemies!
- 3 different enemy types!
- 7 unique upgrades!

Hi, I'm Steven, and this is the first game I have created as an indie developer. If you have suggestions on how to improve the game leave a comment, and it just might go in the next update!

Original music composed by Joel Gutierrez.
